title: ICLR 2018 Conference Acceptance Decision
comment:
Thank you for submitting you paper to ICLR. The big-picture idea is fairly simple, although the implementation is certainly challenging requiring a deep generative model to be trained as part of the final system. The experimental validation is not sufficient to warrant publication. A comparison to a larger number of competitors e.g. [1,2] on a greater range of tasks is required.

[1] Continual Learning Through Synaptic Intelligence Friedemann Zenke BenPoole SuryaGanguli, ICML 2017
[2] Gradient Episodic Memory for Continual Learning, David Lopez-Paz and Marc’Aurelio Ranzato, NIPS 2017
